Hello. Where do i deploy tracking codes to place on my website?

Hey there! To deploy tracking codes on your website, you'll need to integrate the NewsBreak Pixel. You can do this by embedding a JavaScript code snippet on your site. If you're using Shopify, you can follow the specific instructions for integrating the NewsBreak Pixel into your store. Here's a helpful article that guides you through the process: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). Let me know if you need more help!
Where can I get the code?

You can get the NewsBreak Pixel code by logging into your NewsBreak account and navigating to Tools > Ad Manager > Event Management. Choose 'Pixel' as your tracking type, select 'Shopify' as the integration method, and specify your event type. Once you've filled in all the required fields, the code and instructions will be generated for you. If you need more detailed steps, check out this article: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). Let me know if there's anything else you need!
how can I dynamically insert ad set name into my link

To dynamically insert the ad set name into your link, you can use macros. Macros are predefined tags that allow you to customize tracking links and collect valuable campaign data. For example, you can use a macro like `__ADSET_NAME__` in your URL to automatically replace it with the actual ad set name when the link is generated. You can find more information about using macros in NewsBreak's Ad Manager here: [NewsBreak Macros](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/20033538330637-NewsBreak-Macros).
